input.sentences: the last time i visited the castle | i had a bad experience .
they saved the chains they used to bind me up .
i was stuck there for 20 days | with only this view to look at .
this is the room they kept me in .

output.sentences: One time we visited historic looking building.
It was a beautiful day and the cement work was incredible.
The views from the top were breath taking, there was an island in the center of the water.
